channel.title: Deer on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Fleeing Deer
item.description:
I swear it’s not an impressionist painting, just a blurry photo I took yesterday during my forest walk. The deer were watching me from the edge of the woods, not far away. The moment lasted a long time, until I ruined it by pulling out my phone. At that point, they took flight.

If you’re reading from the RSS feed or the newsletter, click here to see the actual image.
item.content:encoded:
